kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: ${output} = 2019-08-22 03:14:27 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-22 03:14:27 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-08-22 03:14:27 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-22 03:14:27 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019-08-22 03:14:27 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:191 - XceiverClientMetrics metrics system started 2019-08-22 03:14:28 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-E509C45852AF->b0e15ff3-87bb-420e-9518-64c1ef826c6e: receive RaftClientReply:client-E509C45852AF->b0e15ff3-87bb-420e-9518-64c1ef826c6e@group-E982945ADF1D, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=1, commits[b0e15ff3-87bb-420e-9518-64c1ef826c6e:c2] 2019-08-22 03:14:28 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-E509C45852AF->b0e15ff3-87bb-420e-9518-64c1ef826c6e: receive RaftClientReply:client-E509C45852AF->b0e15ff3-87bb-420e-9518-64c1ef826c6e@group-E982945ADF1D, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=3, commits[b0e15ff3-87bb-420e-9518-64c1ef826c6e:c4]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.msg: ${result} = Found 3 items -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 1159555 2019-08-22 03:14 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/key1 -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 22125 1970-03-10 09:32 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/ozone-42120 drwxrwxrwx - ...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
